name: Quantum Cat-astrophe
description:
Schrodinger's cat has been subject to a horrible science experiment, giving it the capacity to both be alive and dead at the same time. Can it rescue the dog before another catastrophe befalls them? Navigate yourself in the laboratory and cooperate to save the dog and escape the facility!

Controls

Move: WASD, arrow keys

Jump: space

Interact with dead body when ghost: E

Credits

Programming: George (George), Armando (armandorusso), Jordan (jordan--vision)

Art: Keven (kindaokev)

Sound & Music: Jordan
